author: mariadalfonso
body:
This PR update the siPM pulse shape to cope the difference seen in data with what we expected from MC.

Validation here
http://dalfonso.web.cern.ch/dalfonso/dalfonso_pulseShapePR.pdf

Impact on HEP17 only and data only:
1) M2 energy (now is currently underestimated of a 20%) and related quantities
2) raw energy is also updated since phase containment use the pulse shape
3) M3 is also updated with the new shape, (very small impact is expected here)

To be tested this PR (for M2 energy/M0 raw energy/M3 energy) need an updated recoShapeID  in the GT @abdoulline

We can discuss at tomorrow RECO meeting
https://indico.cern.ch/event/642366/

@deguio @kpedro88 @hatakeyamak @igv4321 @jaylawhorn
title: HEP17: pulse shape update (M2,M3,M0)
